name: Twee Pop
description: Distinct Post-Punk background and often jangling guitars, defined by a cute aesthetic and lyrics combined with an indie/DIY attitude and a simplicity often indebted to Punk Rock.

children.name: Cuddlecore
children.description: Rawer and more Punk informed, downplaying jangly guitars in favor of heavier yet still light-hearted tones; often features influence from the contemporary Riot Grrrl movement.
